title: Identify nice sans serif typeface
content:
Any ideas on this? (With special attention to the “a” )

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [jackpoint.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012145142/http:/typophile.com/files/jackpoint.jpg) | 28.14 KB |

 [‹ Serif similar to Sabon or Garamond](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012145142/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46755 "Go to previous forum topic") [Epic Rivalry Book Cover ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012145142/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46757 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Trenton Harold

comments.content:
OK, 1 more that is similar, has a different “l”

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012145142im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/calidda_5205.jpg)
Looks like [Bliss](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012145142/http:/www.typography.net/type/bliss.htm), with the stem of the a’s removed.
OK, yes, I see what you are saying. Thank you!
